org.apache.flink.graph.examples

类 GSAPageRank<K>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.graph.examples.GSAPageRank<K>
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    GraphAlgorithm<K,java.lang.Double,java.lang.Double,DataSet<Vertex<K,java.lang.Double>>>

    public class GSAPageRank<K>
extends java.lang.Object
implements GraphAlgorithm<K,java.lang.Double,java.lang.Double,DataSet<Vertex<K,java.lang.Double>>>
    This is an implementation of a simple PageRank algorithm, using a gather-sum-apply iteration. The user can define the damping factor and the maximum number of iterations.

    The implementation assumes that each page has at least one incoming and one outgoing link.

        public GSAPageRank(double beta,
                   int maxIterations)
        Creates an instance of the GSA PageRank algorithm.

        The implementation assumes that each page has at least one incoming and one outgoing link.

        参数:
        beta - the damping factor
        maxIterations - the maximum number of iterations
